Covid-19 Update

12/08/2020

Due to new instances of community trasmission of Covid-19, Auckland is going to be back in Self-Isolation as of 12pm noon on Wednesday the 12th of August (today!).

This means Varsity Toastmasters will not be meeting on campus.

For tonight's meeting, we'ill be using Zoom. Here's the link!

Semester 2, 2020

08/08/2020

If you're interested in joining Varsity Toastmasters, you can join us on Wednesdays from 6-8pm.
For the rest of the year, we'll be meeting in the Humanities building, room 206-215.

UPDATE: Who knows when we'll be back on campus! We'll keep you up-to-date on what's happening.
